Package ivory.index

Provides classes for building inverted indexes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BuildInvertedIndexDocSorted Indexer for building document-sorted inverted indexes (both positional and non-positional).
BuildPostingsForwardIndex  
ComputeDictionarySize  
ComputeDistributedDictionarySize  
DistributeGlobalStatsToPostings  
ExtractCfFromPostings  
ExtractDfFromPostings  
ExtractGlobalStatsFromPostings  
MergePostings  
TermDocno A Hadoop WritableComparable that represents a term and a document that contains that term.
TermDocno.Comparator Comparator optimized for TermDocno objects.
TermPositions A Hadoop Writable that encodes the position of term occurrences within a document.
TermScoreDocno A Hadoop WritableComparable that represents a term, a score, and a docno with the score.
TermScoreDocno.Comparator Comparator optimized for TermScoreDocno objects.
WordCount

Provides classes for building inverted indexes.
